p: The oil measurements were performed on three samples with different n‐3 FA content: Menhaden fish oil (high n‐3 FA content), soybean oil (medium n‐3 FA content), and corn oil (low n‐3 FA content) (Sigma‐Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA). The oils were poured into small plastic spheres (Ø 38 mm) and measured at room temperature.
